name: JSON
description: Contains methods for serializing Apex objects into JSON format and deserializing JSON content that was serialized using the serialize method in this class.

creategenerator(boolean).name: createGenerator
creategenerator(boolean).overrideSignature: public static override System.JSONGenerator createGenerator(Boolean prettyPrint)

prettyprint.name: prettyPrint
prettyprint.description: Determines whether the JSON generator creates JSON content in pretty-print format with the content indented. Set to true to create indented content.

createparser(string).name: createParser
createparser(string).overrideSignature: public static override System.JSONParser createParser(String jsonString)

deserialize(string,system.type).name: deserialize
deserialize(string,system.type).signature: public static Object deserialize(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
deserialize(string,system.type).overrideSignature: public static override Object deserialize(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
deserialize(string,system.type).description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into an Apex object of the specified type.

apextype.name: apexType
apextype.description: The JSON content to deserialize. The Apex type of the object that this method creates after deserializing the JSON content.

deserializestrict(string,system.type).name: deserializeStrict
deserializestrict(string,system.type).signature: public static Object deserializeStrict(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
deserializestrict(string,system.type).overrideSignature: public static override Object deserializeStrict(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
deserializestrict(string,system.type).description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into an Apex object of the specified type.

apextype.name: apexType
apextype.description: The JSON content to deserialize. The Apex type of the object that this method creates after deserializing the JSON content.

deserializeuntyped(string).name: deserializeUntyped
deserializeuntyped(string).overrideSignature: public static override Object deserializeUntyped(String jsonString)
deserializeuntyped(string).description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into collections of primitive data types.

serialize(object).name: serialize
serialize(object).overrideSignature: public static override String serialize(Object objectToSerialize)
serialize(object).description: Serializes Apex objects into JSON content.

serialize(object,boolean).name: serialize
serialize(object,boolean).signature: public static String serialize(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
serialize(object,boolean).overrideSignature: public static override String serialize(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
serialize(object,boolean).description: Suppresses null values when serializing Apex objects into JSON content.

suppressapexobjectnulls.name: suppressApexObjectNulls
suppressapexobjectnulls.description: The Apex object to serialize. If true, remove null values before serializing the JSON object.

serializepretty(object).name: serializePretty
serializepretty(object).overrideSignature: public static override String serializePretty(Object objectToSerialize)
serializepretty(object).description: Serializes Apex objects into JSON content and generates indented content using the pretty-print format.

serializepretty(object,boolean).name: serializePretty
serializepretty(object,boolean).signature: public static String serializePretty(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
serializepretty(object,boolean).overrideSignature: public static override String serializePretty(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
serializepretty(object,boolean).description: Suppresses null values when serializing Apex objects into JSON content and generates indented content using the pretty-print format.

suppressapexobjectnulls.name: suppressApexObjectNulls
suppressapexobjectnulls.description: The Apex object to serialize. If true, remove null values before serializing the JSON object.
